body.name: HGTV Magazine Kindle Edition
body.description: HGTV Magazine gives you insider secrets from your favorite HGTV stars. Can't get enough? Get the magazine on the go, whenever and wherever you want it. Subscribe to HGTV Magazine and get decorating ideas for you home, design tips, and real advice every month.Kindle Magazines are fully downloaded onto your Kindle so you can read them even when you're not wirelessly connected.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,137,551 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #64 in Lifestyle & Culture eMagazines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real Deal for Art too
reviews.reviewText: Last year I was working for a company doing medical claims and my boss brought in a copy of the magazine sharing a picture that featured his sister. Her Art work was right there on the page and she was able to supplement her income with her talents. This is the first time I had realized that real people produce this production. So, I enjoy this magazine even more knowing that personal story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this magazine!
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this magazine. There are some magazines that are fine to receive on electronic devices, but I prefer this in paper with the digital for saving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pay attention to device choices
reviews.reviewText: My HGTV magazine subscription can only be read on my iPhone and I have a small older model, so it isn't an easy and relaxing read........ I have tried to change the deliver to an alternate device but it doesn't provide the choices. I would prefer it n my laptop so I can really enjoy reading it online.The magazine itself has always been a favorite and I have almost every copy since its inception.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Excellent read, as always never disappoints , I enjoy the ideas gives me a lot of inspiration for my own cozy place .Is not to long or to short it is just right, I also like the items that show prices and where it can be found. Will be keeping this subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This magazine holds everything (from articles to advertisements) that home owners need to know, need to have, need to fix, need to cook, need to buy, etc., etc., etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2013
reviews.reviewText: This is first time when I bought HGTV Magazine. I wasn't impressed. I was expecting more advises and ideas then advertising.So it is under my expectation. Example : " If you want to renovate your kitchen cabinets go to Home Depot and you will find everything there". O yeah? Thank you . Then why should I buy your Magazine? In my opinion this Magazine is pretty poor . Maybe somebody else could be pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love when the mail comes with this magazine included!
reviews.reviewText: I've subscribed to HGTV Magazine for years and it's an easy read with great tips inside!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps me uptodate
reviews.reviewText: Like the format. Not too much not too little. Helpful advertising that doesn't drown you in glamorous stuff that you don't need or can't afford. Just right. Helpful projects that inspire me. Love the high / low list!
